wikipedia_page.main: John Stuart Penton Lumley (born September 1936) is a councilman of the City of London Corporation, where he represents the ward of Aldersgate. He is a former professor of Vascular Surgery at the University of London and former world president of the International College of Surgeons. He was a council member of the Royal College of Surgeons, chair of two academic boards of the Worshipful Company of Apothecaries, and has written or edited more than 60 medical textbooks.

response: *John Stuart Penton Lumley, former professor of Vascular Surgery at the University of London
